name: Montego Bay Tour Excursion
description: This will let you experience some wonderful scenery of Montego Bay and the surrounding area, and other places. Leave the high prices, Do your own thing. Also here you can drink a beer while on the tour. This tour contains a sight seen of the Rich man Hill Great House which over look of Montego Bay. This will give you a 360 degree angle look of the town, next we will continue out to the Rose Hall Great house and also see the white witch golf course there you can take some picture. There is an entrance fee of {$20} per person at this attraction. We will go though Iron shore residential area where you will see homes, villas and other interesting sights too. We will head down to the hip strip were you can go to the Beach, Shopping or go to Margaritaville. We will then return to the ship. The cost for this tour is $150 1-4 persons.50% deposit down with your card, and the rest of cash on the day of the tour, we do not take credit cards on the tour day.
